attributes.action: ensure that every single time that a scientific advisory body's advice is disregarded in policy decisions, a paper is published in the daily press that shows why the government decided to ignore that advice in making policy decisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the electorate of Great Britain, demand greater transparency in policy decisions based on scientific advice. When scientific advice from independant bodies or government quangos etc. is disregarded in favour of making policy decisions that are not in line with that advice, we want to see why those decisions were made with a full and frank statement to the press explaining the policy decision and why scientific advice and evidence was disregarded.
